name: (XQC fan-game) ProtectTheJuice
description:
This game is based on XQC.

- This game is a 3D single-player horror game based on XQC

- You are a guard and you are tasked with protecting the juice which you yourself crave.

-  You have to protect it for 5 Days and something may happen on the 5th day  ;)

Hope you enjoy it! XQCL 

Solo Made by: Koferperk
